name: Gastronauts (OSG)
description:
[ This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #51 : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/gastronauts ]

Fullscreen is recommended

Following the recent discovery of Planet X, GASA has gone bankrupt, and so can no longer afford to buy fuel for their rockets. However, an ingenious engineer had the brilliant idea of trying to burn methane for fuel, and it worked! So, GASA hired YOU, one of the most prestigeous chefs in the world, to create the best meal to produce methane for their missions. Ad astra!

How to Play:

Place ingredients on the plate to make a meal for the mission. These ingredients change the abilities and stats of the astronaut. Once in space, you have seconds of that meal, ten of them, which should be enough to get you back home, if you measure your uses well. Gather alien ingredients to make your meals stronger,  and find out the right ingredients to get you to Planet X!

Controls:

  • Mouse for everything

Credits:

Programming, Art, Game Design and SFX:

  • Mateus Boga

Music: 

  • AleXZavesa
  • AmarantaMusic
  • JuliusH
  • PianoDeuss
